channel.title: Ceramicscalc PHP package
channel.description: Ceramicscalc is a small PHP package to represent ceramics analyses and materials. Materials can be either Primitive (e.g. Whiting, Kaolin, Feldspar) or Composite (i.e. recipes). Composite Materials can be composed of both Primitive and other Composite Materials, allowing for normal recipes, substitutions (e.g. sub "fake" wood ash for real wood ash), and glaze blends (e.g. 50% Leach Clear 50% Pinnell Clear). https://github.com/derekphilipau/ceramicscalc This package is used by the new Glazy. It needs work! I am also only familiar with svn and new to git. Over the next few days I will try to learn more about git, add more phpunit tests, and refactor the code.

item.title: Ceramicscalc PHP package
item.dc:creator: derek
item.description:
Ceramicscalc is a small PHP package to represent ceramics analyses and materials. Materials can be either Primitive (e.g. Whiting, Kaolin, Feldspar) or Composite (i.e. recipes). Composite Materials can be composed of both Primitive and other Composite Materials, allowing for normal recipes, substitutions (e.g. sub “fake” wood ash for real wood ash), and glaze blends (e.g. 50% Leach Clear 50% Pinnell Clear).

GitHub

derekphilipau/ceramicscalc

PHP package for representing ceramics analyses, materials, and recipes. - derekphilipau/ceramicscalc


This package is used by the new Glazy. It needs work! I am also only familiar with svn and new to git. Over the next few days I will try to learn more about git, add more phpunit tests, and refactor the code.

Read full topic
